outline:
1. wing, extremity, edge, winged, border, corner, shirt
    1. wing
    2. extremity
      1. skirt, corner (of garment)
kjv_def: [phrase] bird, border, corner, end, feather(-ed), [idiom] flying, [phrase] (one an-) other, overspreading, [idiom] quarters, skirt, [idiom] sort, uttermost part, wing(-ed).
strongs_def: an edge or extremity; specifically (of a bird or army) a wing, (of a garment or bedclothing) a flap, (of the earth) a quarter, (of a building) a pinnacle
